experience.title: AI Product Manager
responsibilities: Owned roadmap for AI-powered credit risk scoring products used by enterprise clients.
Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to ship models from prototype to production.
Defined success metrics and ran A/B tests to improve model adoption and user engagement.

experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Developed machine learning models for transaction fraud detection and customer churn prediction.
Built data pipelines and dashboards to monitor model performance and business KPIs.
Partnered with compliance and risk teams to ensure responsible AI practices.

skills.name: Product Management
skills.description: End-to-end ownership of AI product lifecycle from discovery to launch.

skills.name: Machine Learning Systems
skills.description: Designing, deploying, and monitoring production ML services.

skills.name: Stakeholder Communication
skills.description: Translating technical concepts into clear business impact for executives.

skills.name: SQL & Python
skills.description: Hands-on data analysis, feature engineering, and prototyping.

awards.title: Innovation Award 2023
awards.description: Recognized for launching an AI-based lending product that increased approval speed by 40%.

extracurriculars.title: Organizer, Tokyo ML Meetup
extracurriculars.description: Organizes monthly meetups on practical machine learning and MLOps topics.

target_role_taxonomy.role_description: Leads cross-functional teams to design, build, and scale AI-powered products that deliver measurable business value.

job_responsibilities: Define and drive the vision for AI-powered products in the digital banking portfolio.
Partner with data science, engineering, and design to prioritize and deliver impactful features.
Establish measurable success metrics and run experiments to validate product hypotheses.
Communicate roadmap, trade-offs, and results to senior leadership and key stakeholders.
